title: so i just played against a renketon
body: every chance he had to freeze he didnt, just shoved to tower and got ganked over and over.  after the game i tell him freeze next time, and he says its too risky because if hec ganks another lane ill just tower dive him as riven... apparently riven can 1v1 renek under tower and thats more risky than shoving to my tower for free kills. i dont even...
